content:
# The furnace currently has produced 4 iron plates but is reporting "no ingredients to smelt." This indicates that the furnace has run out of iron ore to process, which is why it hasn't produced the desired amount of iron plates.
# 
# Since I have 5 iron ore left in my inventory, I can insert the remaining iron ore into the furnace to allow it to continue smelting and produce the last iron plate needed.
# 
# I will proceed to insert the remaining 5 iron ore into the furnace.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting the remaining 5 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after insertion.
